00045 class IterativeRobot : public RobotBase {
00046 public:
00047     /*
00048      * The default period for the periodic function calls (seconds)
00049      * Setting the period to 0.0 will cause the periodic functions to follow
00050      * the Driver Station packet rate of about 50Hz.
00051      */
00052     static const double kDefaultPeriod = 0.0;
00053 
00054     virtual void StartCompetition();
00055

00059     virtual void TeleopInit();
00060

00062     virtual void AutonomousPeriodic();
00063     virtual void TeleopPeriodic();
00064 
00065     virtual void DisabledContinuous();
00066     virtual void AutonomousContinuous();
00067     virtual void TeleopContinuous();
00068 
00069     void SetPeriod(double period);
00070     double GetPeriod();
00071     double GetLoopsPerSec();
00072

00074     virtual ~IterativeRobot();
00075     IterativeRobot();
00076

00078     bool NextPeriodReady();
00079 
00080     bool m_disabledInitialized;
00081     bool m_autonomousInitialized;
00082     bool m_teleopInitialized;
00083     double m_period;
00084     Timer m_mainLoopTimer;
